page.title: 05CHURCHES IN UPWEY
page.content: IN THE UPWEY AREA THERE ARE THREE CHURCHES.THE ONE IN OUR BLOCK IS{ST.} {LAWRENCE}CHURCH WHICH IS CHURCH OF ENGLAND. IT IS OVER 20 GENERATIONS OLD,AND 600 YEARS AGO{THE BLACK DEATH}KILLED THE PRIEST AND NEARLY HALF THE CONGREGATION. THE NORTH ARCADE-AISLE,THE PORCH,AND THE WEST TOWER DATE FROM ABOUT 1475.SLENDER PILLARS CAN BE SEEN IN THE NORTH AISLE CLOSE TO A MEDIEAVAL DOOR.EACH NAVE ARCADE HAS LEAF ORNAMENTS,AND THERE ARE PATRONS INITIALS.THERE IS ALSO A CONSECRATION CROSS,AND REMARKABLY SOME FRAGMENTS OF {15TH CENTURY GLASS.}
